TopicTitle: Request to add "Kerbalist Kerman" to Kerbal Space Program 2

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

As a long-time player of Kerbal Space Program, I have always enjoyed the humor and creativity of the game. One thing that has always made me smile is the way that the game's developers have named the Kerbals after famous astronauts and scientists.

However, there is one name that I feel is missing from the game - "Kerbalist Kerman". This name is a play on words, referring to the fact that many Kerbal Space Program players have a tendency to crash their rockets, and the resulting ballistic trajectory that their Kerbals experience.

I think that "Kerbalist Kerman" would be a great addition to the game, and would fit perfectly with the game's style and sense of humor. As a fan of the game, I would like to request that the developers consider adding this name to the upcoming release of Kerbal Space Program 2.

I am confident that many other players would also appreciate this addition to the game. Thank you for your consideration, and I look forward to seeing "Kerbalist Kerman" in Kerbal Space Program 2.
